title: I was spiderman.
content:
Today I had the unfortunate experience of locking myself out of my appartment.   
   
The cheap bastard I am, I didn't want to pay the $30 the locksmith wanted... I decided to try with a ladder.   
   
It didn't reach up so I had to do some serious spiderman climbing to get in, and now I'm hoping nobody called the cops.   
   
Anyone else played spiderman today?
author: sevenfingers
